meanings.definition: Resembling a tree in appearance or structure.
meanings.sent1: The tall, treelike figure stood proudly in the forest.
meanings.sent2: The artist painted a treelike scene with vibrant colors.
meanings.sent3: The treelike lampshade added a touch of nature to the room.
meanings.sent4: Her treelike arms reached out to embrace her friends.
meanings.sent5: The treelike shadow cast by the streetlight danced on the pavement.

meanings.definition: Having characteristics or qualities similar to a tree.
meanings.sent1: The treelike roots of the ancient oak spread far and wide.
meanings.sent2: The treelike growth of the company made it a market leader.
meanings.sent3: The treelike patience of the teacher helped the students learn.
meanings.sent4: His treelike wisdom guided him through difficult decisions.
meanings.sent5: The treelike strength of the community held them together during tough times.
